Inspect skin.sentence: The healthcare provider examines the patient's skin for any abnormalities.
Inspect skin.subject: The healthcare provider

Inspect skin.sentence: The healthcare provider uses a light source to enhance visibility during the inspection.
Inspect skin.subject: The healthcare provider

Inspect skin.sentence: The healthcare provider palpates the skin to assess texture and temperature.
Inspect skin.subject: The healthcare provider

Inspect skin.sentence: The healthcare provider documents any findings in the patient's medical record.
Inspect skin.subject: The healthcare provider

Inspect skin.sentence: The healthcare provider discusses the findings with the patient and suggests further evaluation if necessary.
Inspect skin.subject: The healthcare provider
